name: Classic T
description: Revisit your childhood in these Question Mid Men's Basketball Shoes sugared up with Candy Land accents. Their B-ball roots honor legendary scoring champion Allen Iverson. Then they get a little sweet with a quilted ice cream cone design that wraps around the ankle.
